title: FOOD RECIPE APP
pitch: Are you tired of constantly wasting food because you're not sure what to make with the ingredients you have on hand? Say goodbye to food waste and hello to Foodie - your ultimate food app for using what you already have in your pantry!

title: PLANNER APP
pitch: A simple planner app that allows users to save events and tasks for the day or week.

title: QUIZ GAME
pitch: The quiz game comprises five questions centered around general knowledge.

title: WEATHER DASHBOARD
pitch: A comprehensive weather forecast application that displays both the current weather and a 5-day forecast.

title: EMPLOYEE INFORMATION
pitch: The project involves transforming given starter code into a functional Node.js command-line application. This application will gather information about employees on a software engineering team and generate an HTML webpage displaying summaries for each person. Comprehensive tests have been provided to ensure all aspects of the code pass successfully.

title: BOOTSTRAP PORTFOLIO
pitch: This portfolio serves as a reflection of my expertise and a gateway to the world of web development. Within this project, I've extensively explored the Bootstrap framework, meticulously crafting a responsive design adaptable across laptops and mobile devices.
